sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container class="text-center">
        <v-row class="text-center">
            <v-col cols="3"/>
            <v-col cols="6">
                <v-card
                    elevation="2"
                >
                    <v-card-title >Faça seu Login</v-card-title>
                    <v-card-text>
                        <v-container>
                            <v-row>
                                <v-text-field
                                label="Usuário"
                                color="green"/>
                                <v-text-field
                                    v-model="password"
                                    :append-icon="show1 ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
                                    :rules="[rules.required]"
                                    :type="show1 ? 'text' : 'password'"
                                    label="Senha"
                                    counter
                                    @click:append="show1 = !show1"
                                ></v-text-field>
                            </v-row>
                        </v-container>
                    </v-card-text>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'LoginComponent',

    data: () =>({
      senha: "Senha",
      show1: false,
      rules: {
          required: value => !!value || 'Obrigatório.'
        },
    }),
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
